name: Twin Escape
description:
My teams submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam, as well as our first game jam submission ever!

It is a bullet hell game in which you control two separate characters, both of which are trying to break out of the prison they have been trapped in.

Credit to Artimoop and Chawtics for art, and Vindsvept for the music

https://vindsvept.bandcamp.com/track/he-has-escaped

=========CONTROLS==========

[Arrow Keys] - Move

[Z] - Shoot

[Ctrl] - Swap Characters

[Shift] - Focus Movement

[Esc] - Exit Game

[Tab] - Toggle Fullscreen
